thread.title: Copper River IT Named to Washington Business Journal's Fastest Growing Companies 2015
thread.title_full: Copper River IT Named to Washington Business Journal's Fastest Growing Companies 2015

author: Cheryl Nicely
title: Copper River IT Named to Washington Business Journal's Fastest Growing Companies 2015
text:
Copper River IT, a leading provider of dynamic, comprehensive Information Technology solutions and services, was recognized by the Washington Business Journal’s “Fastest Growing Companies 2015”. This annual ranking of companies requires a strict threshold of qualifications to be met in order to make this list; to qualify, companies had to be headquartered in the Washington region, and if private, they had to be independently owned. In addition, companies had to have revenue of at least $2 million in 2012 and at least $10 million in 2014, with revenue growth occurring in every year during that span. This year, there were over 1,500 companies that were vying for this honor. “We are extremely proud to be recognized by Washington Business Journal for this prestigious award,” states H. Benjamin Brucker, CEO of Copper River IT. “It is a tremendous honor- and one that would not have been possible without the relentless passion, dedication, and hard work of our incredible team who work tirelessly to support our customers.”
The specific rankings of each company will not be made public until the October 30, 2015 when Washington Business Journal will publish the full, detailed report.
Established in 2006 as a Federally Recognized Alaskan Tribal 8(a) Certified entity, Copper River IT provides dynamic, comprehensive Information Technology solutions and services to federal government, commercial enterprise, service provider and telecommunication customers. Copper River’s full scope of IT and network capabilities including hardware/software procurement, network engineering, systems engineering, enterprise support services, and advanced network education solutions that are designed to support the diverse communication needs of their clients. Leveraging elite-level partnerships with industry-leading manufacturers, combined with their expert engineering and proven past performance, Copper River IT is THE Solutions Provider for today’s Information Technology requirements.
###
